source: TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_SEQ_00<tab>Jenomis is crestfallen at the thought he might never see his son again. See if there is aught you can do to put his mind at ease.
target: TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_SEQ_00<tab>大道具部屋のジェノミス・レクセンテールは、ラムザを救出すべく考えを巡らせているようだ。

source:
TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_SEQ_01<tab>A timely Echo-induced flashback gives you insight into Ramza Beoulve's final confrontation with Ultima, the High Seraph, and how Orran Durai and King Delita Heiral worked to see their companion's legacy both erased and preserved. The only path left for you...and all of Hydaelyn is to confront the Angel of Blood once more beneath the Orbonne Monastery.

※The Orbonne Monastery can be accessed via the Duty Finder.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_SEQ_01<tab>冒険者の過去視により、勇者ラムザとアルテマの因縁、そしてイヴァリース伝説の真実が明らかになった。「楽欲の僧院 オーボンヌ」を攻略し、聖天使アルテマを打ち破り、ラムザを救い出そう。
 
※コンテンツファインダーから攻略に参加できます。

source: TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_SEQ_02<tab>Ultima is defeated and the land rid of her foul presence once and for all. Ramza, however, has yet to regain consciousness. All you can do now is wait.
target: TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_SEQ_02<tab>「楽欲の僧院 オーボンヌ」を攻略した。劇場艇プリマビスタの大道具部屋に戻ろう。

source: TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_SEQ_03<tab>Aetherial visions of the hero Ramza Beoulve and King Delita appear to grant you and the Lexentales their thanks before returning once and for all to the Lifestream.
target: TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_SEQ_03<tab>勇者ラムザは、冒険者に感謝の言葉を残し、光となって消えていった。大道具部屋の「ジェノミス・レクセンテール」と話そう。

source: TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_SEQ_04<tab>Jenomis, despite having fulfilled his lifelong desire to discover the truth behind Ivalice and his ancestor Orran Durai, has second thoughts about revealing his discovery to the world. He instead elects to tell the tale in an all-new final act of his renowned play, <var 1A 02 /var>The Zodiac Brave Story<var 1A 01 /var>. After witnessing the Majestic Theater Company rehearse this heartwarming scene, both you and Lina Mewrilah are at a loss for words...or at least you are.
target: TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_SEQ_04<tab>ジェノミスは、真の歴史を闇に葬った勇者ラムザと聖騎士ディリータの想いをくみ、真相を発表しないと宣言。そして、劇団マジェスティックは、新たな戯曲「真のゾディアックブレイブストーリー」上演に向け、稽古をはじめる。彼ら名もなき戦士の生きた証を、物語として後世へと残すために。クガネ・ランディング前の「リナ・ミュリラー」と話そう。

source: TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_SEQ_05<tab>Lina Mewrilah is thoroughly satisfied with the outcome of events, and decides she will remain in Kugane for as long as her employers at <var 1A 02 /var>The Raven<var 1A 01 /var> will foot the bill. Who knows, perhaps before that time comes, another opportunity for adventure with the Lexentales will arise?
target: TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_SEQ_05<tab>リナも独占取材が上手くいったことに満足そうだ。マジェスティックがクガネで公演を行う際には連絡をしてくれるそうだ。いつかの再会とラムザたちの晴れ舞台を未来への楽しみに、新たな冒険を続けていこう。

source: TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_GIJUK_500_000<tab>If you need help finding Ramza, do not hesitate to ask. We are here to help. I like to think it is what Ba'Gamnan would have wished.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_GIJUK_500_000<tab>エエ？　そんなことがあったのカイ？
オレも手助けするからサ、助けに行こうゼ！
バッガモナン兄貴もそれを願ってるはずダ！

source: TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_RINOK_500_005<tab>Is the boy's father well? I cannot imagine what he is going through. Losing his daughter, only to lose his son moments after her return...
target:
TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_RINOK_500_005<tab>……そりゃ、ジェノミスとかいう髭のおっさんも心配だろうネェ。
アタイの息子がそんなになったら、
心配で心配で鱗が白くなり剥がれちまうヨ……ああ、嫌だネェ。

source: TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_JENOMISLEXENTALE_000_000<tab>We need to do <var 1A 02 /var>something<var 1A 01 /var>...but what recourse is left to us? The only means we had of protecting ourselves could not even prevent my son from... My son from...
target:
TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_JENOMISLEXENTALE_000_000<tab>それにしても、まさかこんなことになろうとは……。
とはいえ……なんとかラムザを救出する手立てを考えなければ。

source: TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_MIKOTO_000_010<tab>I am sorry, Jenomis. My design was...flawed...
target:
TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_MIKOTO_000_010<tab>申し訳ございません……。
私の設計が間違っていたのですね……。

source: TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_FRAN_000_011<tab>Not necessarily, Sharlayan. We all saw how it succeeded in drawing Alma back from the rift and shattering the Otius. The loss of the boy is not yours to bear.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_FRAN_000_011<tab>いや、少なくとも一度はアルマから「魔」を引き離したのだ。
聖石オティスとやらを破壊することはできたのだから、
貴殿はきっちりと仕事をこなしていたのだと思う……。

source: TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_FRAN_000_012<tab>Our focus here should not be on our failures, but what we have learned from them. The being beyond the rift─it spoke before claiming Ramza. It referred to you as the “blood of its invokers.” Could it be your ancestors are responsible for Ultima's summoning?
target:
TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_FRAN_000_012<tab>気になったのは、「魔」が語ったことだ。
自らを召喚した者の末裔を憑代にすると……。
ラムザ……貴殿ら親子の祖先があの「魔」を召喚……？

source: TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_JENOMISLEXENTALE_000_013<tab>Most certainly not! I have discovered no such inference anywhere in the Durai Papers! Besides, tales of the High Seraph existed far before even the earliest of Ivalician legends.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_JENOMISLEXENTALE_000_013<tab>まさか！？　デュライ白書にそんな記述は存在しない！
それどころか、そもそも聖天使アルテマは、
イヴァリース時代の遙か昔から存在していたと記されている……。

source: TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_FRAN_000_014<tab>Then who exactly did summon Ultima, and why does she think them your kin?
target: TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_FRAN_000_014<tab>……とすると、あの「魔」を召喚した者とはいったい？

source: TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_MIKOTO_000_015<tab>Look!
target: TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_MIKOTO_000_015<tab>ああ！？

source: TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_MONTBLANC_000_016<tab>I have a bad feeling about this, kupo!
target: TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_MONTBLANC_000_016<tab>ネックレスが……クポ！？

source: TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_DELITAHEIRAL_000_050<tab>(-???-)Ramza, dead!? You lie about as well as you carry yourself in battle, Orran.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_DELITAHEIRAL_000_050<tab>(-？？？？-)そんな……まさか……ラムザが死んだ……だと！？
おまえは何を言ってるんだ、オーラン？
嘘だと言ってくれ……？

source: TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_ORRANDURAI_000_051<tab>I did not say he was dead, my Lord Delita, merely that he had abandoned his mortal vessel, entrusting his aetherial soul to the auracite.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_ORRANDURAI_000_051<tab>死んだのではありませぬ、ディリータ卿。
肉体を捨て、エーテルとなって最後の願いを聖石に託したのです。

source: TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_DELITAHEIRAL_000_052<tab>But why would he do such a thing? Peace is finally come to Ivalice! There is naught to be had from further sacrifice!
target:
TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_DELITAHEIRAL_000_052<tab>死んだのと同然ではないか！？　何故だ……？
ようやく、このイヴァリースの戦乱が収まり平和になったのに。
何故、ラムザが犠牲にならねばならんのだ……ッ！？

source: TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_DELITAHEIRAL_000_053<tab>The kingdom is won, and this victory is as much his as it is mine! He risked life and limb to shield me from the dark that would have seen me perish.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_DELITAHEIRAL_000_053<tab>この国を平定した今、次に救わねばならないのは真の友・ラムザ！
自分が今この立場にいられるのも、
陰でラムザが暗躍する者どもを退治してくれたからだ！

source: TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_DELITAHEIRAL_000_054<tab>Without him, I would not be standing here before you. It is my duty as both king and colleague to see him saved!
target:
TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_DELITAHEIRAL_000_054<tab>ラムザがいたからこそ、今の自分がいる……。
常に助けられていたんだ……アイツに……。
なのに……ッ！！

source: TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_DELITAHEIRAL_000_055<tab>Knights, to me! We ride for Orbonne!
target:
TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_DELITAHEIRAL_000_055<tab>誰ぞ、誰ぞあれッ！！
救出部隊を至急、編成するのだッ！！

source: TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_ORRANDURAI_000_056<tab>My lord! Wait!
target: TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_ORRANDURAI_000_056<tab>お待ちください、ディリータ卿！

source: TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_ORRANDURAI_000_057<tab>Ajora Glabados, first of the Zodiac Braves, was not the hero the church would have you believe. He betrayed Mother Hydaelyn for the promise of coin and power, summoning forth a terrible evil from the depths of the celestial abyss.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_ORRANDURAI_000_057<tab>ゾディアックブレイブの始祖として名高い聖アジョラは、
ハイデリンの堕天した使徒、ハイデリンを憎む者！

source: TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_ORRANDURAI_000_058<tab>It was believed only one of the land's chosen─only a Warrior of Light might stand against this threat.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_ORRANDURAI_000_058<tab>アジョラが召喚したあの禍々しき者を倒せるのは
やはり「光の戦士」しかおりませぬ！

source: TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_ORRANDURAI_000_059<tab>Yet while victorious in battle, Ramza was unable to see the darkness vanquished. If failure was all that awaited <var 1A 02 /var>our<var 1A 01 /var> Warrior of Light, then what chance do you presume any other might stand?
target:
TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_ORRANDURAI_000_059<tab>ですが、あの禍々しき者を、今の我々では倒すことはできませぬ！
ハイデリンの使徒、光の戦士であるラムザですら敵わぬのですッ！

source: TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_DELITAHEIRAL_000_060<tab>Are you saying I should do nothing, then!?
target:
TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_DELITAHEIRAL_000_060<tab>手をこまねいて、ここで、ただ見ていろと……。
おまえはそう言うのかッ、オーラン！

source: TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_ALMABEOULVE_000_061<tab>No, my lord. Ramza is. My brother's final wish before he surrendered to the aether was that his name be struck from the annals of history.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_ALMABEOULVE_000_061<tab>兄ラムザはこう申しておりました。
「我を歴史から消せ」……と。

source: TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_DELITAHEIRAL_000_062<tab>Alma, you're unhurt! But I was led to believe none but Orran returned from Orbonne. What is this you speak of your brother's wishes?
target:
TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_DELITAHEIRAL_000_062<tab>アルマ？　アルマ、きみは無事だったのか！
……「歴史から消せ」？
それはいったいどういう意味だ？

source: TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_ORRANDURAI_000_063<tab>When it became apparent that we were powerless to truly defeat the High Seraph, we chose the only path left to us─to do what Hydaelyn Herself did countless centuries past: imprison Ultima.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_ORRANDURAI_000_063<tab>聖天使アルテマを討滅することのできなかった我々は、
かつてのハイデリンの使徒がそうしたように奴を煉獄に封印した。
そう……命をなげうって二重三重の封印を施した……。

source: TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_ORRANDURAI_000_064<tab>And as you are aware, my lord, a prison is only as strong as the <var 1A 02 /var>seal<var 1A 01 /var> on its gates...
target:
TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_ORRANDURAI_000_064<tab>それがどういう意味なのか……
ディリータ、おまえにだってわかるだろう？

source: TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_ALMABEOULVE_000_065<tab>Ramza sacrificed his body to ensure that the Angel of Blood would never again walk the land, and he believed that if people knew of this sacrifice, it would only inspire them to seek out the Holy Stones and repeat the mistakes of those come before.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_ALMABEOULVE_000_065<tab>存在が残ってしまっては、再び、聖石を悪用しようとする者たちが、
兄の足跡をたどり、いつかあの地へたどり着くだろうと……
だからこそ、その存在を抹消して欲しいと。

source: TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_ALMABEOULVE_000_066<tab>If you truly avouch yourself his friend, then you will honor this, his final plea.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_ALMABEOULVE_000_066<tab>この言葉を貴方に伝えるため、私とオーランは……
うしろ髪を引かれる思いで……ここに……ここに……。

source: TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_DELITAHEIRAL_000_067<tab>No! Ramza should not be forgotten! He should be raised up as a hero for his deeds and claim his rightful place at my side. Only he might be my Knight Gallant!
target:
TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_DELITAHEIRAL_000_067<tab>馬鹿な！　むしろラムザは英雄として讃えられるべきだ！
再び「天騎士」としてこの国を共に支えるのはラムザしかいない！
そうだろ？　アルマッ！　オーランッ！

source: TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_ORRANDURAI_000_068<tab>He is gone, my lord.
target: TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_ORRANDURAI_000_068<tab>ラムザはもういない……いないんだ……。

source: TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_ALMABEOULVE_000_069<tab>Before Ramza was your friend, before he was my brother, he was a Warrior of Light. He did what he did for Hydaelyn, and for those who would one day, too, heed the Crystal's call.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_ALMABEOULVE_000_069<tab>兄はハイデリンの使徒として……光の戦士として……
次の使徒にその夢を託しました……。
次世代の「力ある者」にすべてを託したのです……。

source: TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_RAMZABEOULVE_000_070<tab>Claim the throne, my friend. Become ruler of Ivalice and restore peace to this war-torn realm once and for all.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_RAMZABEOULVE_000_070<tab>……王になれ、ディリータ。
新たなイヴァリースの王になり、この地に永遠の平和を！

source: TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_DELITAHEIRAL_000_071<tab>Wait, Ramza! Don't leave me! Please! I beg of you!
target:
TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_DELITAHEIRAL_000_071<tab>ま、待ってくれ……ラムザ……。
オレにはおまえが必要だ！　行かないでくれ！
…………頼むッ！

source: TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_RAMZABEOULVE_000_072<tab>You will make a fine and just king, Delita. See you do not stray from that path.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_RAMZABEOULVE_000_072<tab>……あとは頼んだぞ。
きみは「善き王」になれる！

source: TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_DELITAHEIRAL_000_073<tab>Ramza!
target: TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_DELITAHEIRAL_000_073<tab>ラムザッ…………。

source: TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_DELITAHEIRAL_000_074<tab>The stones in these two necklaces, you are certain they will guide the heroes of a new era to Ramza?
target:
TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_DELITAHEIRAL_000_074<tab>これでよいのだな。
いつしか、この聖石がラムザのもとへ次世代の使徒を導く。

source: TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_ORRANDURAI_000_075<tab>'Tis what Ramza wished, my lord.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_ORRANDURAI_000_075<tab>はい、彼の遺言どおりです、ディリータ卿。
あとは…………。

source: TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_DELITAHEIRAL_000_076<tab>Orran, I do not believe I can bear another farewell this day. Will you not reconsider my offer to remain as a member of my court?
target:
TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_DELITAHEIRAL_000_076<tab>オーラン、オレは貴公まで失いたくはない。
これは嘘偽りのない本心ぞ。
思い直してはくれまいか……。

source: TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_ORRANDURAI_000_077<tab>'Tis but a matter of time before the Cardinal and his Temple Knights grow wise to my past. I would not have my presence here implicate you as well.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_ORRANDURAI_000_077<tab>いけませぬ。
法王庁と神殿騎士団はいずれこの私にたどり着くでしょう。
後顧の憂いを絶たねばなりません。

source: TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_ORRANDURAI_000_078<tab>Ramza beseeched me strike his name from history, but like you, my lord, I could not bear the thought of future generations blind to the truth. As such, I penned this chronicle of the hero's journeys.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_ORRANDURAI_000_078<tab>ここには私が目にした「真実」をしたためました。
いつか、次世代の使徒の役に立つことでしょう。
ですが、この書を今、愚者どもに委ねるわけにはいきません。

source: TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_ORRANDURAI_000_079<tab>I fear the world, however, is not yet ready for the gospel contained within these pages; nor would the church ever allow its circulation. In fact, I believe they will confiscate every existing copy and lock them away in their library.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_ORRANDURAI_000_079<tab>今ならばこの書は教会にとって、
ただの「教会の不正を暴いた書」にしか見えないはずです。
それ故、彼らはこの書を隠蔽し、自らの書庫に保管するはず……。

source: TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_ALMABEOULVE_000_080<tab>And what better way for the words to remain forever preserved than in one of the most highly guarded vaults in all the realm? Then, one day, when the church has fallen out of favor, the chronicle will be discovered and truth shall prevail.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_ALMABEOULVE_000_080<tab>教会の書庫には何十万冊もの「禁書」が保管されています。
ひとたび、そこに保管されたら、何人たりとも閲覧は不可能。
世に出る時はすなわち、教会は尊厳を失い人心が離れた時……。

source: TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_DELITAHEIRAL_000_081<tab>I must admit, your plan is intriguing, Orran...but once the church learns it was you who penned the chronicle, your life─
target:
TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_DELITAHEIRAL_000_081<tab>唯一残されたラムザに関する真実の書を、敵に預け、
永遠に封印させるというのだな。
だが、その代わり、オーラン……貴公は…………。

source: TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_LINAMEWRILAH_000_100<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>!
target: TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_LINAMEWRILAH_000_100<tab>どうしたんです！？　大丈夫ですか？

source: TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_MIKOTO_000_101<tab>'Twas the Echo, wasn't it?
target: TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_MIKOTO_000_101<tab>もしや……「超える力」が発動したのでは……？

source: TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_JENOMISLEXENTALE_000_102<tab>The removal of Ramza's name from the history books, the Durai Papers, the pendants...it was all set in motion by Orran himself!
target:
TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_JENOMISLEXENTALE_000_102<tab>……なんということだ。
我が祖先のオーラン・デュライと英雄王ディリータが、
すべてを謀ったというのか……。

source: TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_FRAN_000_103<tab>And if the liberator's visions are to be taken as fact, it also appears we now know what the High Seraph meant by “blood of my invoker.”
target:
TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_FRAN_000_103<tab>今の話が真実だとするならば、
聖天使アルテマを召喚した者の末裔とは……

source: TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_MIKOTO_000_104<tab>She was not speaking of ancestors in the sense of <var 1A 02 /var>actual<var 1A 01 /var> kin, but the line of those chosen by Hydaelyn to serve Her as Warriors of Light.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_MIKOTO_000_104<tab>血脈ではなく、ハイデリンが認めた勇者……ということですか。
なるほど、すべての辻褄は合いますね。

source: TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_LINAMEWRILAH_000_105<tab>But then why abduct Ramza...or even Alma? Unless...there is something you haven't been telling us!
target:
TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_LINAMEWRILAH_000_105<tab>だとしたら、どうしてアルテマはラムザくんを？
オティスに魅入られたアルマちゃんはわかるけど、
どうしてラムザくんを？

source: TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_ALMALEXENTALE_000_106<tab>She was using us...to lure <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. It is <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((his)) /var> vessel the High Seraph desires.
target: TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_ALMALEXENTALE_000_106<tab>冒険者さんを……冒険者さんを呼び寄せる餌……。

source: TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_LINAMEWRILAH_000_107<tab>Matron's teats, Alma, how long have you been awake!?
target: TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_LINAMEWRILAH_000_107<tab>アルマちゃん、大丈夫！？

source: TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_FRAN_000_108<tab><sigh> I've been a fool...
target: TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_FRAN_000_108<tab>どうやら、私は浅はかだったようだ……。

source: TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_FRAN_000_109<tab>I told our leader that it did not matter if our request for aid was refused, for I had an alternative ploy.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_FRAN_000_109<tab>エオルゼア軍事同盟や東方連合の支援、
そして東アルデナード商会の資金援助など駄目でもともと。
それならそれでセカンドプランを実行すればよいだけのこと。

source: TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_FRAN_100_109<tab>I told our leader that it did not matter if our request for aid was refused, for I had an alternative ploy.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_FRAN_100_109<tab>エオルゼア軍事同盟やドマの支援、
そして東アルデナード商会の資金援助など駄目でもともと。
それならそれでセカンドプランを実行すればよいだけのこと。

source: TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_BWAGI_000_110<tab>General!
target: TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_BWAGI_000_110<tab>(-ブワジ-)あ、姐さん…………。

source: TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_FRAN_000_111<tab>It is all right, Bwagi. My intention was to claim one of these auracite in the name of the resistance and use its power to lay waste to the Garlean occupants. Only now do I realize how flawed my ambitions were.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_FRAN_000_111<tab>セカンドプラン……すなわち「聖石」を奪取し、
ガレマール帝国との来るべき戦いに「兵器」として投入する。
……フフ、我ながら甘すぎた計画のようだった。

source: TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_LINAMEWRILAH_000_112<tab>You mean this whole time you were playing us for fools!? Why didn't we see it earlier!? Never trust a woman with ears longer than mine, I always say!
target:
TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_LINAMEWRILAH_000_112<tab>あ、貴女、そんなつもりで……！
バッカじゃないのッ！！

source: TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_FRAN_000_113<tab>You've every right to be angry, and I apologize for misleading you. But believe me, I no longer have any desire to deceive you and yours. I shall see you to the Orbonne Monastery, and ask naught in return but that you let me join you in your rescue of Ramza.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_FRAN_000_113<tab>心は決まった。
私が貴殿をオーボンヌ修道院へ……
その深部へ案内しようぞ。

source: TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_FRAN_000_114<tab>Do not misunderstand me. I do not do this for any <var 1A 02 /var>one<var 1A 01 /var> of you.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_FRAN_000_114<tab>早とちりをしないで欲しい。
私には、亡命ガレアン人の悲願なんぞ、どうでもよい。
だが、こんな「危険」が彼の地にあるのだとしたら見過ごせん……。

source: TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_FRAN_000_115<tab>I do it for my people in both Golmore and Rabanastre─people who may die if this High Seraph is allowed to return to power.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_FRAN_000_115<tab>我が故郷・ゴルモア大密林のために……
ひいてはダルマスカ王国のために……
貴殿に課せられた使命が果たされるのを見届けようぞ。

source: TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_JENOMISLEXENTALE_500_030<tab>It pains me as a father that I am powerless to save my own son. <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, I have asked much of you these past moons, but naught is more important than what I ask you now. Please, find Ramza.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_JENOMISLEXENTALE_500_030<tab>またもや、きみにすべてを委ねることになるとは……
無力な自分を恥じるよ……。
お願いだ、ラムザを……息子を助け出して欲しい……頼む……！

source: TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_ALMALEXENTALE_500_035<tab>This is all my fault. I was convinced it was Ramza and my father who were bedeviled by the auracite...when in fact, it was me all along...
target:
TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_ALMALEXENTALE_500_035<tab>すみませんでした……すべては私のせいなんですね……。
聖石に魅入られたのは父さんと兄さんだとばかり……。
いつの間にか、私がそうなっていただなんて……。

source: TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_00543_MIKOTO_500_036<tab>You are wrong, Alma. The auracite held no power over you. It never did. Your concern for your family was justified, for they allowed their desires to cloud their own judgment.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_00543_MIKOTO_500_036<tab>違いますよ、アルマさん。
以前、ご説明したとおり、聖石に興味を持つのと、
聖石自体が操るのとは別なんです！

source: TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_00543_MIKOTO_500_037<tab>You needn't blame yourself for matters beyond your control.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_00543_MIKOTO_500_037<tab>貴女の責任じゃないんです……。
気にするのはもうやめにしましょう。

source: TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_ALMALEXENTALE_500_038<tab>But what of Ramza? He's gone because he tried to save <var 1A 02 /var>me<var 1A 01 /var>...
target: TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_ALMALEXENTALE_500_038<tab>はい、それでも、兄さんは私を助けるために……。

source: TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_00543_ALMALEXENTALE_500_039<tab>Please, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. You must bring back my brother. I...I don't know what I would do if I lost him, too...
target:
TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_00543_ALMALEXENTALE_500_039<tab>お願いです、兄さんを……兄さんを必ず助け出してください！
これ以上、家族を失うのは嫌……！
もう……誰かが死ぬのを見るのは嫌なんです……。

source: TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_MONTBLANC_000_200<tab>He's awake, kupo! ...But is it truly <var 1A 01 /var>him<var 1A 01 /var>?
target: TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_MONTBLANC_000_200<tab>大丈夫クポッ！！

source: TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_RAMZALEXENTALE_000_201<tab>Thank you. Thank you all for coming to my aid.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_RAMZALEXENTALE_000_201<tab>ありがとうございます……。
助けてくださったんですね……。

source: TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_RAMZABEOULVE_000_202<tab>And you have my thanks, noble Warrior of Light. You have achieved what I could not.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_RAMZABEOULVE_000_202<tab>ありがとう、ハイデリンの使徒にして、我が兄弟よ……。
よくぞ、我々の悲願を果たしてくれた。
心から感謝する……。

source: TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_RAMZABEOULVE_000_203<tab>And you, bearer of my blood and the blood of House Durai. Thank you for seeing my final wish fulfilled.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_RAMZABEOULVE_000_203<tab>我がベオルブ家とデュライ家の血を受け継ぐ者よ……。
聖石ヴァルゴに込めし我が望みを受け止めてくれて、
本当にありがとう……皆が感謝している。

source: TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_RAMZABEOULVE_000_204<tab>My sacrifice has finally been given meaning...
target: TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_RAMZABEOULVE_000_204<tab>諦めずに夢を託した甲斐があったな……

source: TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_RAMZABEOULVE_000_205<tab>Now, my friends, let us retire to Mother Hydaelyn's bosom, that we may finally rest.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_RAMZABEOULVE_000_205<tab>さぁ、みんな、行こうか。
今こそ、ハイデリンのもとへ……
母なるエーテルの海へ還るとしよう…………。

source: TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_RAMZABEOULVE_000_206<tab>Farewell. You are the true heroes of this story.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_RAMZABEOULVE_000_206<tab>さらばだ、我が末裔よ、
そして、我が同胞よ……！

source: TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_RAMZABEOULVE_000_207<tab>Delita. How I have missed you, old friend.
target: TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_RAMZABEOULVE_000_207<tab>ディリータ、迎えに来てくれたのか……嬉しいよ。

source: TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_DELITAHEIRAL_000_208<tab>Forgive me, Ramza! You deserved better than what history gave you. I...I could have done more... I am truly sorry...
target:
TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_DELITAHEIRAL_000_208<tab>許してくれ、友よ。
私はきみの存在を後世に伝えようとはしなかった。
それこそが、ラムザ……きみの願いだと知ってたから。

source: TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_DELITAHEIRAL_000_209<tab>These countless centuries did I long for the day that we might meet once again. And now, that time is finally come. Hydaelyn beckons us both.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_DELITAHEIRAL_000_209<tab>だが、親友のきみを忘れたことは一度もない。
今日まで本当にありがとう。
さぁ、共に旅立とう、母なるハイデリンのもとへ……。

source: TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_00543_MIKOTO_500_060<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. It is almost sad to see our quest come to an end, though we have given the land's scholars much to consider. Sharlayan will have to open a school of Ivalician studies, are we to keep up.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_00543_MIKOTO_500_060<tab>おかえりなさいませ。
……ようやく胸をなで下ろすことができますね。
そして、この冒険の旅もいよいよ……。

source: TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_00543_FRAN_500_065<tab>I owe you an apology, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. I was wrong to doubt you.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_00543_FRAN_500_065<tab>ゼノスを討ちドマを解放した……というのは本当だったのだな。
私は貴殿を侮っていたようだ、
……失礼した、謝罪しよう。すまなかった。

source: TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_00543_FRAN_500_066<tab>Whether it be in a council room or on the field of battle, you have proven yourself more than worthy of the many praises the bards sing. I am glad to have counted you an ally, for I would not wish you upon even my worst enemy.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_00543_FRAN_500_066<tab>そして、我が故郷に巣くうあの悪魔を退治してくれたことに、
我が一族に成り代わり礼を言おう。
ありがとう、深く感謝する……。

source: TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_00543_BWAGI_500_070<tab>Despite what Lady Fran says, <var 1A 02 /var>I<var 1A 01 /var> had no doubt that you would come through in the end. It has been an honor, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. I only wish Ba'Gamnan were here with us to celebrate this day...
target:
TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_00543_BWAGI_500_070<tab>やったナ……さすがだゼ、アンタはやっぱスゲェや……。
兄貴も……バッガモナンの兄貴も喜んでるだろうゼ……。
ありがとナ……。

source: TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_00543_RAMZALEXENTALE_500_075<tab>And here we are, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. I cannot thank you enough for all you have done for my family...and that is before you saved me from the High Seraph!
target:
TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_00543_RAMZALEXENTALE_500_075<tab>最後の最後まで<var 08 E905 ((貴女)) ((貴方)) /var>には本当にお世話になりました。
この命を救っていただいたこと、一生、忘れはしません！

source: TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_00543_ALMALEXENTALE_500_080<tab>You rescued my brother, and for that I shall ever be indebted to you. You will be in my heart, always, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_00543_ALMALEXENTALE_500_080<tab>兄さんを救い出していただき本当にありがとうございます！
冒険者さんには、なんてお礼を申し上げればよいのか……。

source: TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_00543_GIJUK_500_085<tab>You slew the she-devil who brought those unholy stones into the world? Then Ba'Gamnan can finally rest in peace. Thank you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_00543_GIJUK_500_085<tab>そうか、そうか、聖石を生み出す悪魔のヤローを倒したンだナ！
さっすが光の戦士様っていったところカナ！！
……兄貴の弔い合戦もこれでオシマイだ。

source: TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_00543_RINOK_500_090<tab>My only regret is that if we had grown wise to the High Seraph's presence sooner, perhaps our captain, too, would be here to enjoy this victory...
target:
TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_00543_RINOK_500_090<tab>……ありがとネ、バッガモナン兄貴の仇を討ってくレテ。
聖石がなければ兄貴もああはならなかっただろうし、
アンタも兄貴を討つ必要はなかったはすだからネ……。

source: TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_00543_LINAMEWRILAH_500_095<tab>You're alive! Oh, but of course you are. You'd think that after this many triumphs, one might grow tired of saving the world. Consider us all fortunate that you have not! Ah hah hah hah!
target:
TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_00543_LINAMEWRILAH_500_095<tab>おかえりなさいっ！
ラムザくんも冒険者さんも、み～んなご無事でホント良かった！
あ、ごめんなさい……涙が……。

source: TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_00543_MONTBLANC_500_100<tab>But they were <var 1A 02 /var>there<var 1A 01 /var>, Hurdy, clear as day─the hero Ramza and good King Delita! Why would I lie about something like that, kupo?
target:
TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_00543_MONTBLANC_500_100<tab>勇者ラムザと英雄王ディリータに会ったクポ！
嘘じゃないクポ！　本当だクポ！
一生に一度の経験だったクポ！！

source: TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_00543_HURDY_500_101<tab>My question is, why <var 1A 02 /var>wouldn't<var 1A 01 /var> you? Still, after what we've all been through in the past few days, I <var 1A 02 /var>might<var 1A 01 /var> be willing to give you the benefit of the doubt...this time, kupo!
target:
TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_00543_HURDY_500_101<tab>兄ちゃんが嘘ついてるなんて思ってないクポ～。
もっと詳しい話を聞かせて欲しいクポ！
他の兄弟たちもみんな聞きたがる冒険譚だクポ！！

source: TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_JENOMISLEXENTALE_000_300<tab>I am so sorry, Ramza. Alma. I convinced myself my research was the most important thing in my life, all the while you two were standing before me. Can you find it in your hearts to forgive your father?
target:
TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_JENOMISLEXENTALE_000_300<tab>おまえが無事に戻ってくれて本当に嬉しく思う……。
すまなかったな、ラムザ、アルマ。
私の我が儘におまえたちを巻き込んでしまった……。

source: TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_ALMALEXENTALE_000_301<tab>It is all right. We are still here, are we not?
target:
TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_ALMALEXENTALE_000_301<tab>父さん、もう大丈夫。
……すべては終わったのだから。

source: TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_RAMZALEXENTALE_000_302<tab>And we triumphed. We <var 1A 02 /var>proved<var 1A 01 /var> your theory true. Ivalice existed. Ramza existed. And Orran Durai was not a heretic, but a hero. Now all that remains is to tell the world!
target:
TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_RAMZALEXENTALE_000_302<tab>デュライ白書はたしかに真実の書でしたね、父さん……。
ボクらはオーランが愚かな異端者でないことを確認できました。
あとはこれをどうやって世に知らしめるか……。

source: TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_JENOMISLEXENTALE_000_303<tab>No, my son. We needn't burden ourselves further.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_JENOMISLEXENTALE_000_303<tab>もうよい……もうよいのだ。
無理に真実を広める必要はない。

source: TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_RAMZALEXENTALE_000_304<tab>But Father! We cannot allow our ancestor's name to remain─
target: TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_RAMZALEXENTALE_000_304<tab>だけど、父さん、それではオーランが……。

source: TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_JENOMISLEXENTALE_000_305<tab>And we will not. Yet simply not in the manner you think.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_JENOMISLEXENTALE_000_305<tab>私は戯曲「真のゾディアックブレイブストーリー」を完成させる。
そこで前作で触れていないラムザやオーランたちを登場させよう。
だが、そこに登場する彼らはアルテマに敗れていない。

source: TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_JENOMISLEXENTALE_000_306<tab>I shall be adding a final act to <var 1A 02 /var>The Zodiac Brave Story<var 1A 01 /var> telling of how Ramza the forgotten hero and his chronicler Orran Durai smote the Angel of Blood and saved Ivalice from an age of darkness, before quietly embarking on a final journey that would take them far beyond the horizon.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_JENOMISLEXENTALE_000_306<tab>勇者たち……ゾディアックブレイブは勝った！
勝利を収め、イヴァリースに真の平和が戻る。
そして、彼らは旅に出る……。

source: TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_JENOMISLEXENTALE_000_307<tab>And of course, I shall not leave out those <var 1A 02 /var>nameless<var 1A 01 /var> heroes who fought alongside Ramza─without whom the young noble would have surely perished.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_JENOMISLEXENTALE_000_307<tab>生き残った彼らは歴史に記されない名も無き戦士だが、
それでも彼らは一生懸命に戦ったと、物語は伝えるのだ。
精一杯に使命を全うし、そして新たな旅に出る……と。

source: TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_ALMALEXENTALE_000_308<tab>Is that what you truly want, Father? For the story to end?
target: TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_ALMALEXENTALE_000_308<tab>いいの……？　父さん、それで？

source: TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_JENOMISLEXENTALE_000_309<tab>It will only end on the stage, my dear, and live on in the hearts of the crowd.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_JENOMISLEXENTALE_000_309<tab>物語の中で彼らは生き続ける。
そして、その物語が面白ければ観客は彼らを好きになってくれる。
観客が好きでいる限り、彼らが永遠に忘れられることはない。

source: TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_RAMZALEXENTALE_000_310<tab>King Delita and Orran envisioned the Virgo as a beacon which would lead future generations to the truth about the founding of their kingdom. They were right. And just as the pendants guided us, now we shall guide the masses through our play.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_RAMZALEXENTALE_000_310<tab>ボクらが聖石ヴァルゴに導かれ、その意思と記憶を受け継いだ。
同じように、父さんの書く戯曲が残る限り、
勇者ラムザとその一行は永遠に語り継がれるんですね……。

source: TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_JENOMISLEXENTALE_000_311<tab>And now you see, my son.
target: TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_JENOMISLEXENTALE_000_311<tab>ああ、そういうことだ。

source: TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_JENOMISLEXENTALE_000_312<tab>I would offer you my thanks again, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, but thanks are not nearly enough to express my gratitude for all you have given us.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_JENOMISLEXENTALE_000_312<tab>これまでの協力に感謝する……
いや、そんな言葉では足りないな……。

source: TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_JENOMISLEXENTALE_000_313<tab>Perhaps after I complete <var 1A 02 /var>The Zodiac Brave Story<var 1A 01 /var>, I shall pen a tale about the legendary Warrior of Light and <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((his)) /var> adventures across the Three Great Continents.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_JENOMISLEXENTALE_000_313<tab>きみは、まさに勇者……伝説に謳われる「光の戦士」だ。
きみの活躍が永遠に語り継がれるよう、
私はきみを主人公にした戯曲を書くことにするよ、約束する。

source: TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_CID_000_314<tab>Then you'll have your work cut out for you, my friend. <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> has enough battles under <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((his)) /var> belt to fill at least three tomes, if not four.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_CID_000_314<tab>フッ……だったら、ジェノミス、きみはもっと<var 08 E905 ((彼女)) ((彼)) /var>のことを……
ハイデリンの使徒である<var 08 E905 ((彼女)) ((彼)) /var>の奇妙な冒険譚を知る必要があるな。
エオルゼア、イシュガルド、そしてドマ……長い旅路だ。

source: TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_LINAMEWRILAH_000_315<tab>Would you stop doing that, Cid?
target:
TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_LINAMEWRILAH_000_315<tab>シドさん、それに……
冒険者さんの旅はまだ終わっていませんよ！

source: TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_CID_000_316<tab>And <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((his)) /var> tale is far from over, isn't it?
target:
TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_CID_000_316<tab>ああ、もちろんだ。
まだまだ頑張ってもらわないとな！

source: TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_JENOMISLEXENTALE_000_350<tab>All right, this is our final dress rehearsal for the night. Make it count. Positions, everyone!
target:
TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_JENOMISLEXENTALE_000_350<tab>よし、ここから最後まで通し稽古をやってみよう。
立ち位置に気をつけるんだぞ。

source: TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_RAMZALEXENTALE_000_351<tab>Yes, Principal!
target: TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_RAMZALEXENTALE_000_351<tab>はい、監督ッ！

source: TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_JENOMISLEXENTALE_000_352<tab>Lights! Music! There will be no more mistakes from you two, am I clear?
target:
TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_JENOMISLEXENTALE_000_352<tab>照明と音楽の準備はいいか？
さっきみたいなヘマはするなよッ！

source: TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_MONTBLANC_000_353<tab>(-Montblanc and Hurdy-)Mothercrystal clear, kupo!
target:
TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_MONTBLANC_000_353<tab>(-モンブラン&ハーディ-)わかってるクポ！！
頑張るクポ～！！

source: TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_LINAMEWRILAH_000_354<tab>They are going to perform the new final act!
target:
TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_LINAMEWRILAH_000_354<tab>このラストシーンは今回の調査に基づいて、
ジェノミスさんが新たに書き下ろしたシーンなんですよ！
楽しみですね！

source: TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_JENOMISLEXENTALE_000_355<tab>Begin!
target: TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_JENOMISLEXENTALE_000_355<tab>よし、スタートッ！！

source: TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_ALMALEXENTALE_000_356<tab>What ever will we do? The church has branded us heretics. No home awaits us in Ivalice.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_ALMALEXENTALE_000_356<tab>兄さん あたしたち これからどうするの……？
もう 元の生活には戻れないよね？

source: TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_RAMZALEXENTALE_000_357<tab>We shall embark on a journey─a journey together!
target:
TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_RAMZALEXENTALE_000_357<tab>異端者だからな…… イヴァリースにいても追われるだけだ……
だから…… ふたりで旅に出よう

source: TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_ALMALEXENTALE_000_358<tab>Together?
target: TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_ALMALEXENTALE_000_358<tab>ふたりで？

source:
TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_RAMZALEXENTALE_000_359<tab>Together! The Crystal's call has been answered and evil vanquished
from the land. We are now free to soar like the griffin!
target:
TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_RAMZALEXENTALE_000_359<tab>ボクらは使命を果たした…… 災いの元凶たる「魔」を退治した
大空を飛ぶ鳥のように これからは「自由」に生きよう！

source: TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_ALMALEXENTALE_000_360<tab>Free? But how?
target:
TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_ALMALEXENTALE_000_360<tab>自由に……生きる……？
そんなことが できるようになる……？

source: TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_RAMZALEXENTALE_000_361<tab>By casting off our noble names and forging a new path─one not bound by fate!
target:
TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_RAMZALEXENTALE_000_361<tab>ボクらは ベオルブの名を捨て ただのひとりの人間として生きる
誰にも縛られずに 「運命」とも距離をおいて 己が道を進むんだ

source: TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_RAMZALEXENTALE_000_362<tab>And on that path we shall meet new friends, make a new family.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_RAMZALEXENTALE_000_362<tab>大丈夫さ ボクらには まだ時間がたくさん残されている
いずれ 新たな友人や家族ができるだろう

source:
TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_RAMZALEXENTALE_000_363<tab>And unto them we shall entrust the true tale of our deeds
that they may carry on our legacy...for all eternity!
target:
TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_RAMZALEXENTALE_000_363<tab>子供ができたら いつか その子供に教えてあげよう あの冒険を！
そして 子孫へと この冒険譚は語り継がれていく……

source: TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_ALMALEXENTALE_000_364<tab>Sword in hand, a warrior clutches stone to breast.
target: TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_ALMALEXENTALE_000_364<tab>戦士は剣を手に取り 胸にひとつの石を抱く

source: TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_RAMZALEXENTALE_000_365<tab>In sword etched he his fading memories.
target: TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_RAMZALEXENTALE_000_365<tab>消えゆく記憶を その剣に刻み

source: TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_ALMALEXENTALE_000_366<tab>In stone he tempered his skill.
target: TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_ALMALEXENTALE_000_366<tab>鍛えた技を その石に託す

source: TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_RAMZALEXENTALE_000_367<tab>By sword attested, by stone revealed.
target: TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_RAMZALEXENTALE_000_367<tab>物語は剣より語られ 石に継がれる

source: TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_RAMZALEXENTALE_000_368<tab>Their tale can now be told!
target: TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_RAMZALEXENTALE_000_368<tab>今 その物語を語ろう…………

source: TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_LINAMEWRILAH_000_369<tab>Bravo! Bravo! You both were wonderful!
target:
TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_LINAMEWRILAH_000_369<tab>素晴らしいッ！　もうサイコ～～ッ！
ラムザくん、アルマちゃん、ふたりとも超ステキ！！

source: TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_JENOMISLEXENTALE_000_370<tab>I am inclined to agree with the Lady Mewrilah's sentiments, but there is always room for improvement. Back to your positions, everyone! Again from the top!
target:
TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_JENOMISLEXENTALE_000_370<tab>ふたりともなかなかよかったぞ！
もう一度、今のシーンを通してやってみようか！

source: TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_MONTBLANC_000_371<tab>Again? I've had enough of this! I was promised a starring role, kupo! It is in my contract!
target:
TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_MONTBLANC_000_371<tab>照明は飽きたクポ！　モグは俳優になりたいんだクポ！！
役が欲しいクポ～～！！

source: TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_HURDY_000_372<tab>Oh, hush, Brother, before Jenomis has us back to polishing boot buckles again!
target:
TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_HURDY_000_372<tab>兄ちゃん、俳優なんて百万年早いクポ！！
さっさと持ち場に着くクポ～～！！

source: TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_SYSTEM_000_399<tab>Meanwhile, in the Clockwork City of Goug...
target: TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_SYSTEM_000_399<tab>一方 リドルアナ大灯台上部・機工都市ゴーグ――

source: TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_GABRANTH_000_400<tab>Well?
target: TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_GABRANTH_000_400<tab>どうだ……？

source: TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_IMPERIALRESEARCHER03189_000_401<tab>Sir! Further research will be required to reach a positive conclusion, but preliminary tests show that the technology utilized here bears striking similarities to our own.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_IMPERIALRESEARCHER03189_000_401<tab>ハッ！
回収後、更なる調査をしないとハッキリしたことは言えませんが、
根幹の設計は我らガレマール帝国のそれと同じかと推測されます！

source: TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_GABRANTH_000_402<tab>Excellent. Let the Eorzeans play with their baubles. True power lies within these very walls.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_GABRANTH_000_402<tab>制御の効かん「聖石」とやらでは意味がないが、
この機械ならばそれも容易いか……。

source: TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_GABRANTH_000_403<tab>It appears our ancestors were as cunning as they were ruthless.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_GABRANTH_000_403<tab>ゴーグの民が我らガレアン人始祖の七部族のひとつという話、
あながち、嘘というわけではなさそうだな……。

source: TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_GABRANTH_000_404<tab>A weapon powerful enough to carve a gateway to the land's very core. His Radiance will be eager to test this “Tartarus,” wouldn't you all agree?
target:
TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_GABRANTH_000_404<tab>リドルアナを作りしタルタロス機構……。
我ら帝国にこそふさわしい、そうは思わぬか？
なぁ、ガラクタの機械人形よ……。

source: TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_00543_MIKOTO_500_200<tab>It has been an honor to serve one as brave and just as you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. I only hope my contributions to this most recent endeavor have proven of value.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_00543_MIKOTO_500_200<tab>お噂どおりに<var 08 E905 ((貴女)) ((貴方)) /var>様は勇敢、そして慈愛に満ちあふれた方……。
こうやって共に成し遂げたことは私にとって誇り……
これからの生き方を見つめ直す機会をいただきました。

source: TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_00543_MIKOTO_500_201<tab>Before this assignment, I would spend my days alone in the library poring over texts, learning of others' accomplishments, but never recording any of my own.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_00543_MIKOTO_500_201<tab>実は、学問を追究する余り、部屋から出ない日々も多く、
私にとって研究とは、本や教授からいただく知識がすべてでした。
ですが、やはり実体験に勝るものはありませんね……。

source: TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_00543_MIKOTO_500_202<tab>But witnessing you and all you achieved in our short time together has inspired me. When I return to Sharlayan, I will put in a request with the Students of Baldesion for an increase in field research!
target:
TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_00543_MIKOTO_500_202<tab>劇場艇の皆様との出会い、そして貴方様との邂逅……
すべてが私にとっては初体験で、何よりも勉強になりました。
これからも外へ出て研究にいそしみたいと考えています。

source: TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_00543_MIKOTO_500_203<tab>But I think I shall start with something in lower La Noscea! Thank you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>!
target: TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_00543_MIKOTO_500_203<tab>それでは、勇者様、ご機嫌よう……！

source: TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_00543_FRAN_500_210<tab>I owe you an apology, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. I was wrong to doubt you.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_00543_FRAN_500_210<tab>ゼノスを討ちドマを解放した……というのは本当だったのだな。
私は貴殿を侮っていたようだ、
……失礼した、謝罪しよう。すまなかった。

source: TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_00543_FRAN_500_211<tab>Whether it be in a council room or on the field of battle, you have proven yourself more than worthy of the many praises the bards sing. I am glad to have counted you an ally, for I would not wish you upon even my worst enemy.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_00543_FRAN_500_211<tab>そして、我が故郷に巣くうあの悪魔を退治してくれたことに、
我が一族に成り代わり礼を言おう。
ありがとう、深く感謝する……。

source: TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_00543_FRAN_500_215<tab>In fact, our paths may cross again sooner than expected. I received word earlier that the Eorzean and Eastern alliances have agreed to assist Lente's Tears, though not in the manner my leader first sought.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_00543_FRAN_500_215<tab>それでは、私はここらでおいとまさせていただこうか。
……実は、先ほど、エオルゼア同盟と東方連合より連絡があった。
別途、願い出ていた難民受け入れの件、承諾を得たのだ。

source: TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_00543_FRAN_500_218<tab>In fact, our paths may cross again sooner than expected. I received word earlier from both the Eorzean Alliance and Doma that they have agreed to assist Lente's Tears, though not in the manner my leader first sought.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_00543_FRAN_500_218<tab>それでは、私はここらでおいとまさせていただこうか。
……実は、先ほど、エオルゼア同盟とドマより連絡があった。
別途、願い出ていた難民受け入れの件、承諾を得たのだ。

source: TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_00543_FRAN_500_220<tab>They will be providing refuge for those displaced by the fighting. Children, elderly, the wounded─I have been assured that all are welcome.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_00543_FRAN_500_220<tab>ダルマスカにはレジスタンスに参加する者だけでない……。
子供や老いた者、怪我人など戦闘に不向きな難民が大勢いるのだ。
かつてドマの難民をエオルゼアで受け入れたと聞いてね……。

source: TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_00543_FRAN_500_221<tab>Unlike our demand for soldiery, both Lady Tataru and Lady Yugiri seemed much more amicable to this request. Perhaps they remembered how only recently Eorzea received refugees fleeing from Doma and Ala Mhigo. And perhaps it was I who reminded them.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_00543_FRAN_500_221<tab>軍事支援は無理でもせめて難民だけでも保護してもらえないかと、
タタル殿とユウギリ殿に打診したのだよ。
快諾していただき、我々としては実に嬉しい限りだ。

source: TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_00543_FRAN_500_222<tab>As for now, I must return to Dalmasca with these tidings, and somehow not only convince the myriad resistance factions to cease their infighting, but also cooperate in the organization of a method in which refugees might be transported safely across the borders.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_00543_FRAN_500_222<tab>この報告を我が「レンテの涙」の代表、及び各グループへ伝達し、
早速、移動の準備に取りかかるつもりだ。

source: TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_00543_FRAN_500_223<tab>Needless to say, I have my work cut out for me. But even then, this is only the beginning. Once the refugees are safe, there is still a war to be fought...and won.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_00543_FRAN_500_223<tab>全難民の移動は難しいだろうが、
戦禍を逃れられる者が少しでもいればダルマスカにとって幸いだ。
……我々も気兼ねせずに命を賭して戦えるというもの。

source: TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_00543_FRAN_500_224<tab>And when that time comes, do not be surprised when I come again calling.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_00543_FRAN_500_224<tab>それでは、さらばだ、ハイデリンの使徒よ。
またいずれどこかで相まみえようぞ……！
運命が我らを導かんことを……！

source: TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_00543_GIJUK_500_230<tab>Reports are that the IVth Legion has marched on Valnain, making the commercial center their new temporary base of operations. If that is so, then that is where we strike next!
target:
TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_00543_GIJUK_500_230<tab>ラバナスタを引き上げた第IV軍団は、
西の商業都市バルナインを本拠地にしているって話ダ！
オレたちゃ、そこを叩くつもりサ！

source: TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_00543_GIJUK_500_231<tab>We had our past misgivings, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, but in the end we all learned to work for the same cause. I hope we can do so again, soon!
target:
TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_00543_GIJUK_500_231<tab>色々あったが、すべてを水に流して出直しってトコだナ！
アンタも死ぬんじゃネェぞ！
元気でナ、またどこかで会おう！　じゃナ！

source: TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_00543_RINOK_500_235<tab>It won't be simple uniting the factions, but when has war ever been simple?
target:
TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_00543_RINOK_500_235<tab>さァて、これから忙しくなるねネェ～！
分断されたレジスタンスグループをひとつにしないとネ！
あたしゃ、やるヨ！　死んだバッガモナン兄貴のためにもネ！

source: TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_00543_RINOK_500_236<tab>Once we are a united front, we still have to figure a means of besting the most powerful army in the world. And if, by some miracle, we achieve that, then we have an entire nation to rebuild...starting with the smoldering heap I used to call home.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_00543_RINOK_500_236<tab>第IV軍団を追い出して、すべてが終わったら、
その次は破壊されたラバナスタの復興だネ！
あの美しかった都を再建してやるンだヨ！

source: TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_00543_RINOK_500_237<tab>But then again, it sure feels better than being a sky pirate. Let the next time we meet, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, be in the Desert Sapphire 'neath the royal Dalmascan standard!
target:
TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_00543_RINOK_500_237<tab>アンタも、その時まで死ぬンじぁないヨッ！！
アタイらが再建した王都ラバナスタをその目で視るまではネ！
……命を惜しみナ！　死んだら元も子もないからネ！　アバヨ！

source: TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_00543_BWAGI_500_240<tab>If Ba'Gamnan were here, he'd smile and slap us both on the back. You'd probably fall on your face. I miss the captain.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_00543_BWAGI_500_240<tab>アンタには世話になっチまったナ……。
兄貴も……バッガモナンの兄貴も喜んでるだろうゼ……。
仇を討ってくれたんだからナ……。

source: TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_00543_BWAGI_500_241<tab>I'm not as optimistic as my brothers as to our chances of meeting again, but know this, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>: I will not forget you, and hope that maybe you will say the same.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_00543_BWAGI_500_241<tab>さて、もうアンタと会うことはないだろうナ。
祖国奪還のためにレジスタンスとしてやれるところまでやるサ。
アンタも達者でナ……アバヨ……！

source: TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_LINAMEWRILAH_000_430<tab>Well, wasn't that an adventure, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>? It is sad to think we must soon part ways, what with all we've been through these past few moons.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_LINAMEWRILAH_000_430<tab>お疲れ様でした、冒険者さん！
おかげさまでよい記事が書けそうです！！
ホンット、冒険者さんには感謝の言葉しかありません！

source: TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_LINAMEWRILAH_000_431<tab>Satisfied with the city's unwillingness to turn him over to the Garleans, Jenomis has decided to purchase a permanent berth above Kugane for the <var 1A 02 /var>Prima Vista<var 1A 01 /var>. Supposedly he has already received petitions from hundreds of geiko and geinin to join the company.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_LINAMEWRILAH_000_431<tab>ジェノミスさんたちは、クガネを起点に公演を始めるみたいです。
幸い、劇団員になりたいっていうクガネの若者たちもいるようで、
これで劇団マジェスティックも息を吹き返しそうですね！

source: TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_LINAMEWRILAH_000_432<tab>And then there is the matter of my assignment. You will be delighted to learn that I am...<var 1A 02 /var>almost<var 1A 01 /var> finished. What? How do you expect one to write an exposé when off battling forces of evil from beyond the void? Don't you worry, though. A few more weeks and I'll have a draft! All right...an outline.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_LINAMEWRILAH_000_432<tab>私は残って、このまま取材を続けるつもりです。
公演が始まったら、冒険者さんにも連絡を入れますね！
その時は必ず、来てくださいヨ、待ってマ～ス！

source: TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_LINAMEWRILAH_000_433<tab>Until then, I'll stay here in Kugane a while longer...at <var 1A 02 /var>The Raven<var 1A 01 /var>'s expense, of course. Farewell!
target:
TEXT_STMBDI303_03189_LINAMEWRILAH_000_433<tab>それでは、失礼しますね！
また、どこかでお会いできることを祈りつつ……！
ではでは、よい旅を！！
